text: mariyu (ibrahim) ila annadu: "Niscayanga, miru prapancika jivitanlo allah nu vadali, vigraharadhananu mi madhya premaku sadhananga cesukunnaru. Kani punarut'thana dinamuna miku parasparam sambandhame ledantaru mariyu parasparam sapincukuntaru mariyu mi asrayam narakagniye mariyu miku sahayapade varu evvaru undaru
